metadata.synopsis: Vinshent Fenteman, male human character outside Elfsong Tavern, drinking and wandering and talking to other characters.

0.speaker: Vinshent Fenteman
0.text: When I think about the poor refugees starving in Rivington, I could just weep. I believe I'll drown my tears in another brandy.

1.speaker: Vinshent Fenteman
1.text: Brandy is the cure for most ills, I do believe.
